verbs.description: [ARG0: The U.S. and North Korea] [V: picked] [ARG1: Singapore] [ARGM-PRD: as the venue for a historic summit between Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un] . A look at the two countries’ embassies in the city - state illustrates the disparity of wealth and power between them and underscores Kim ’s skills in securing the summit .

The U.S. and North Korea picked Singapore as the venue for a historic summit between Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un . [ARG0: A look at the two countries’ embassies in the city - state] [V: illustrates] [ARG1: the disparity of wealth and power between them] and underscores Kim ’s skills in securing the summit .
